Comments on your posts break into multip: Comments on your posts break into multiple pages. As this is not needed in 999 out of 1000 cases, we recommend you disable it. To fix this, uncheck "Break comments into pages..." on the Discussion Settings page.
Comments are displayed on a single page: Comments are displayed on a single page
When you click OK we will open our HelpS: When you click OK we will open our Help Scout beacon where you can find answers to your questions. This beacon will load our support data and also potentially set cookies.
The browser you are currently using is u: The browser you are currently using is unfortunately rather dated. Since we strive to give you the best experience possible, we no longer support this browser. Instead, please use %1$sFirefox%4$s, %2$sChrome%4$s or %3$sMicrosoft Edge%4$s.

Our Local SEO plugin will help you rank: Our Local SEO plugin will help you rank in Google Maps and local results.

The following words and word combination: The following words and word combinations occur the most in the content. These give an indication of what your content focuses on. If the words differ a lot from your topic, you might want to rewrite your content accordingly.
Once you add a bit more copy, we'll give: Once you add a bit more copy, we'll give you a list of words that occur the most in the content. These give an indication of what your content focuses on.

Google has discontinued its Crawl Errors: Google has discontinued its Crawl Errors API. Therefore, any possible crawl errors you might have cannot be displayed here anymore. %1$sRead our statement on this for further information%2$s.
Truly optimize your site for a local aud: Truly optimise your site for a local audience with our %s plugin! Optimised address details, opening hours, store locator and pickup option!
You can edit the details shown in meta d: You can edit the details shown in meta data, like the social profiles, the name and the description of this user on their %1$s profile page.
Choose whether the site represents an or: Choose whether the site represents an organisation or a person.
To make your site represent a Company or: To make your site represent a Company or Organisation go to %1$sSearch Appearance%2$s and set Organisation or Person to "Organisation".

You have previously set your site to rep: You have previously set your site to represent a person. We’ve improved our functionality around Schema and the Knowledge Graph, so you should go in and %1$scomplete those settings%2$s.
You have selected the user %1$s as the p: You have selected the user %1$s as the person this site represents. Their user profile information will now be used in search results. %2$sUpdate their profile to make sure the information is correct.%3$s

If a Wikipedia page for you or your orga: If a Wikipedia page for you or your organisation exists, add it too.
Keyword research is essential in any SEO: Keyword research is essential in any SEO strategy. You decide the search terms you want to be found for, and figure out what words your audience uses to find you. Great keyword research tells you what content you need to start ranking for the terms you want to rank for. Make sure your efforts go into the keywords you actually have a chance at ranking for! The %1$s walks you through this process, step by step.

The Text link counter feature provides i: The Text link counter feature provides insights in how many links are found in your text and how many links are referring to your text. This is very helpful when you are improving your %1$sinternal linking%2$s.

By enabling this option, attachment URLs: By enabling this option, attachment URLs become visible to both your visitors and Google. To add value to your website, they should contain useful information, or they might have a negative impact on your ranking.

This tab allows you to selectively disab: This tab allows you to selectively disable %s features for all sites in the network. When you disable a feature here, site admins will not be able to use that feature at all.

When you upload media (an image or video: When you upload media (an image or video for example) to WordPress, it doesn't just save the media, it creates an attachment URL for it. These attachment pages are quite empty: they contain the media item and maybe a title if you entered one. Because of that, if you never use these attachment URLs, it's better to disable them, and redirect them to the media item itself.

You cannot overrule a WPSEO standard var: You cannot overrule a WPSEO standard variable replacement by registering a variable with the same name. Use the "wpseo_replacements" filter instead to adjust the replacement value.
A replacement variable with the same nam: A replacement variable with the same name has already been registered. Try making your variable name unique.
A replacement variable can not start wit: A replacement variable can not start with "%%cf_" or "%%ct_" as these are reserved for the WPSEO standard variable variables for custom fields and custom taxonomies. Try making your variable name unique.
A replacement variable can only contain: A replacement variable can only contain alphanumeric characters, an underscore or a dash. Try renaming your variable.
